Container.Name: Clipface
Container.Overview: Self-hosted web application for sharing video clips
Container.Description: Super simple, self hosted clip sharing application.

Config.Name: clips_path
Config.Description: The absolute path of the directory containing the clips that Clipface should host.

Config.Name: pagination
Config.Description: If true, the clip list will be split into pages. This is highly recommended if your clip count is in the hundreds, as it will hugely improve the responsiveness of the site. The end user can choose the amount of clips displayed per page.

Config.Name: user_password
Config.Description: A password used to protect this Clipface instance. If set, users must input this password before they can watch any clips or see the list of clips. By default this parameter is not set, which will allow anybody to browse and watch all your clips.
